name: nanotech ammo core (wire)
description: An automated ammo production unit designed to process feedstock into usable ammo as needed, complete with integrated power source.  Unfortunately, it needs to be manually reset when emptied, and cannot be refilled by hand.

use_action.msg: You clear and reset your ammo core.
